trans-unit.source: Represents a panel in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control.

Although the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> control replaces and adds functionality to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control of previous versions, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> represents an individual panel in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> representa um painel individual no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> can contain text and/or an icon that can be used to reflect the status of an application.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> pode conter texto e/ou em um ícone que pode ser usado para refletir o status de um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>, accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, to retrieve, add, or remove an individual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>, acessível por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle, recuperar, adicionar ou remover um indivíduo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> provides properties that enable you to modify the display behavior of a panel within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> fornece propriedades que permitem que você modificar o comportamento de exibição de um painel em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property to display an icon within a panel.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> propriedade para exibir um ícone em um painel.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to provide a graphical representation of state in an application.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade pode ser usada para fornecer uma representação gráfica de estado em um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property enables you to specify how text and/or an icon is aligned within the panel.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> propriedade permite que você especifique como o texto e/ou um ícone é alinhado dentro do painel.

trans-unit.source: To ensure that your panel is sized properly to fit the text of the panel, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property to automatically resize the panel to fit the text of the panel or to fill the remaining space within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir que o painel é dimensionado corretamente para acomodar o texto do painel, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> propriedade automaticamente redimensionar o painel de acordo com o texto do painel ou para preencher o restante de espaço dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> property enables you to specify a minimum width for the panel to ensure that it does not get smaller than the data it is intended to display.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> propriedade permite que você especifique uma largura mínima do painel garantir que ele não obtém menor do que os dados que ele é destinado a exibir.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is typically used to display Help information or state information about your application.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle normalmente é usado para exibir informações de Ajuda ou informações de estado sobre o seu aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Often, it is important to display additional information about data that is presented in a panel.
trans-unit.target: Geralmente, é importante exibir informações adicionais sobre dados que são apresentados em um painel.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> property to display information whenever the mouse pointer rests on a panel.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> propriedade para exibir informações sempre que o ponteiro do mouse está localizada em um painel.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is typically used to display textual information, you can also provide your own type of display to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle normalmente é usado para exibir informações textuais, você também pode fornecer seu próprio tipo de exibição para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property enables you to specify how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> will be drawn.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> propriedade permite que você especifique como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> será desenhada.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property is used to display the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> property (and an icon, if specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> propriedade é usada para exibir o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> propriedade (e um ícone, se especificado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> propriedade).

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle.OwnerDraw>, you can draw your own information into the panel.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle.OwnerDraw>, você pode desenhar suas próprias informações para o painel.

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature to draw a progress bar or an animated icon in the panel.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse recurso para desenhar uma barra de progresso ou um ícone animado no painel.

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class, the read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria uma instância do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> classe, as propriedades de leitura/gravação são definidas com valores iniciais.

trans-unit.source: For a list of these values, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista desses valores, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control on a form and adds two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control em um formulário e adiciona dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application.
trans-unit.target: A primeira <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, denominado `panel1`, exibe o texto de status para um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class to display the current time.
trans-unit.target: A segunda <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, denominado `panel2`, exibe a data atual e usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> classe para exibir a hora atual.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> to add the panels to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> propriedade para garantir que os painéis são exibidos em vez de um painel padrão e utiliza o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> propriedade para acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> para adicionar os painéis para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> properties to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> propriedades para inicializar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo pressupõe que o método definido no exemplo é definido e chamado a partir do construtor de uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> class.
When you create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, the following read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria uma instância de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, as seguintes propriedades de leitura/gravação são definidas com valores iniciais.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Propriedade

trans-unit.source: Initial value
trans-unit.target: Valor inicial

trans-unit.source: A zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres de comprimento zero.

trans-unit.source: A zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres de comprimento zero.

trans-unit.source: You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode alterar o valor de qualquer uma dessas propriedades por meio de uma chamada separada para a propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control on a form and adds two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control em um formulário e adiciona dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application.
trans-unit.target: A primeira <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, denominado `panel1`, exibe o texto de status para um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class to display the current time.
trans-unit.target: A segunda <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, denominado `panel2`, exibe a data atual e usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> classe para exibir a hora atual.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> to add the panels to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> propriedade para garantir que os painéis são exibidos em vez de um painel padrão e utiliza o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> propriedade para acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> para adicionar os painéis para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> properties to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> propriedades para inicializar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo pressupõe que o método definido no exemplo é definido e chamado a partir do construtor de uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of text and icons within the status bar panel.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment.Left" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment.Left" />.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to horizontally align the text and/or icon assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property within the borders of the panel.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para alinhar horizontalmente o texto e/ou ícone atribuído para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> propriedade dentro das bordas do painel.

trans-unit.source: Text and icons can be aligned to the left, right, or center of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Ícones e texto podem ser alinhados à esquerda, direita ou no centro da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.

trans-unit.source: There is no way to independently position an icon within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível posicionar independentemente um ícone dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> while aligning the text on the right side.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você não pode posicionar um ícone ao lado esquerdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> ao alinhamento de texto no lado direito.

trans-unit.source: The icon is always positioned to the left side of the text regardless of how the text is aligned.
trans-unit.target: O ícone é sempre posicionado à esquerda do texto, independentemente de como o texto é alinhado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.SizingGrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A> properties, and how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.SizingGrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A> propriedades e como tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code into a form.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o exemplo, cole o código a seguir em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o `InitializeStatusBarPanels` método no construtor do formulário ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> método manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment" /> enumeration.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the status bar panel is automatically resized.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.None" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.None" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Contents> have precedence over those panels set to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Spring> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos definidos com <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Contents> têm precedência sobre esses painéis definidos como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Spring> valor.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Spring> is shortened if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Contents> requires that space.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> com seus <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> propriedade definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Spring> é reduzido se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> propriedade definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Contents> requer que o espaço.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> to ensure that the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> are properly displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control that contains more than one panel.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> para garantir que o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> são exibidos corretamente em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> que contém mais de um painel de controle.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want a panel that contains text to adjust automatically to the amount of text it is displaying (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Contents>), while another panel on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> that displays an owner-drawn progress bar would need to be a fixed size (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.None>).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, talvez seja um painel que contém o texto para ajustar automaticamente a quantidade de texto que está exibindo (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Contents>), enquanto outro painel o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> que exibe uma barra de progresso de desenho proprietário precisa ter um tamanho fixo (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.None>).

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control on a form and adds two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control em um formulário e adiciona dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application.
trans-unit.target: A primeira <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, denominado `panel1`, exibe o texto de status para um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class to display the current time.
trans-unit.target: A segunda <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, denominado `panel2`, exibe a data atual e usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> classe para exibir a hora atual.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> to add the panels to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> propriedade para garantir que os painéis são exibidos em vez de um painel padrão e utiliza o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> propriedade para acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> para adicionar os painéis para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> properties to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> propriedades para inicializar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo pressupõe que o método definido no exemplo é definido e chamado a partir do construtor de uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize" /> enumeration.
Begins the initialization of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
This method is used to start the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para iniciar a inicialização de um componente que é usado em um formulário ou por outro componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A> method ends the initialization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A> método termina a inicialização.

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A> methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: Usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A> métodos impede que o controle que está sendo usada antes de ser totalmente inicializado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the status bar panel.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle.Sunken" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle.Sunken" />.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to differentiate a panel from other panels in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para diferenciar um painel de outros painéis em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control on a form and adds two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control em um formulário e adiciona dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application.
trans-unit.target: A primeira <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, denominado `panel1`, exibe o texto de status para um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class to display the current time.
trans-unit.target: A segunda <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, denominado `panel2`, exibe a data atual e usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> classe para exibir a hora atual.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> to add the panels to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> propriedade para garantir que os painéis são exibidos em vez de um painel padrão e utiliza o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> propriedade para acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> para adicionar os painéis para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> properties to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> propriedades para inicializar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo pressupõe que o método definido no exemplo é definido e chamado a partir do construtor de uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle" /> enumeration.
<see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo método público `Dispose()` e pelo método <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` invoca o método `Dispose(Boolean)` protegido com o parâmetro `disposing` definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, esse método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> referências.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o método `Dispose()` de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> pode ser chamado várias vezes por outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> cuidado para não fazer referência a objetos que têm foi descartados anteriormente em uma chamada anterior para <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <see langword="Dispose" /> e <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
This method is used to end the initialization of a component that is used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para finalizar a inicialização de um componente que é usado por outro componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A> method starts the initialization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A> método inicia a inicialização.

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A> methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: Usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A> métodos impede que o controle que está sendo usada antes de ser totalmente inicializado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon to display within the status bar panel.
An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> that represents the icon to display in the panel.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> que representa o ícone a ser exibido no painel.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display an icon that represents the state of your application or a process within your application.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para exibir um ícone que representa o estado do seu aplicativo ou um processo dentro de seu aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can display an icon in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to indicate whether a file save operation is in progress or complete.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode exibir um ícone em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> para indicar se um arquivo de operação de gravação está em andamento ou concluída.

trans-unit.source: There is no way to independently position an icon within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível posicionar independentemente um ícone dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> while aligning the text on the right side using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você não pode posicionar um ícone ao lado esquerdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> ao alinhamento de texto no lado direito usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The icon is always positioned to the left side of the panel's text regardless of how the text is aligned.
trans-unit.target: O ícone é sempre posicionado à esquerda do texto do painel, independentemente de como o texto é alinhado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum allowed width of the status bar panel within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control.
The minimum width, in pixels, of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: A largura mínima, em pixels, do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> property is used when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Contents> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Spring> to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> from automatically resizing to a width that is too small.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> propriedade é usada quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Contents> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.Spring> para impedir que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> seja redimensionada automaticamente para uma largura que é muito pequena.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.None>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> property is automatically set to the same value as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize.None>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> propriedade é definida automaticamente como o mesmo valor que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A value less than 0 is assigned to the property.
Gets or sets the name to apply to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Name%2A> property corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Name%2A> propriedade corresponde à chave para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control that hosts the status bar panel.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> that contains the panel.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> que contém o painel.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> is contained within.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para determinar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controlar que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> contidos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects are added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos são adicionados a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle é acessível por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the status bar panel.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle.Text" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle.Text" />.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to indicate whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> displays text or whether the panel is managed as an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para indicar se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> exibe texto ou se o painel é gerenciado como um desenho proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.

trans-unit.source: To determine when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> needs to be drawn, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> precisa ser desenhado, crie um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> passed as a parameter to an event handler of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event enables you to determine which panel needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> passada como um parâmetro para um manipulador de eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> evento permite que você determine qual painel deve ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> also provides a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object you can use to perform drawing tasks on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> também fornece um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> você pode usar para executar tarefas de desenho do objeto de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegate, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> enumeration, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegado, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> classe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> enumeração e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code into a form.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o exemplo, cole o código a seguir em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-method.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o `InitializeStatusBarPanels` método no construtor do formulário ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> método de evento.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle" /> enumeration.
Gets or sets an object that contains data about the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains data about the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que contém dados sobre o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the status bar panel.
The text displayed in the panel.
trans-unit.target: O texto exibido no painel.

trans-unit.source: This property represents the text that is displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle.Text>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa o texto que é exibido quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle.Text>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display information about your application in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para exibir informações sobre o seu aplicativo em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> property to display Help information when the user moves the mouse over a menu or to display the name and location of a file that is opened in an application.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> propriedade para exibir informações de ajuda quando o usuário move o mouse sobre um menu ou para exibir o nome e o local de um arquivo que está aberto em um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: To align the text within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para alinhar o texto dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control on a form and adds two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control em um formulário e adiciona dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application.
trans-unit.target: A primeira <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, denominado `panel1`, exibe o texto de status para um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class to display the current time.
trans-unit.target: A segunda <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, denominado `panel2`, exibe a data atual e usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> classe para exibir a hora atual.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> to add the panels to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> propriedade para garantir que os painéis são exibidos em vez de um painel padrão e utiliza o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> propriedade para acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> para adicionar os painéis para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> properties to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> propriedades para inicializar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo pressupõe que o método definido no exemplo é definido e chamado a partir do construtor de uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets ToolTip text associated with the status bar panel.
The ToolTip text for the panel.
trans-unit.target: O texto de dica de ferramenta do painel.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display additional information in a ToolTip when the mouse pointer rests on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para exibir informações adicionais em uma dica de ferramenta quando o ponteiro do mouse está localizada em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can display a ToolTip that provides data transfer speed for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that displays the status of a file transfer.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode exibir uma dica de ferramenta que fornece a velocidade da transferência de dados para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> que exibe o status de uma transferência de arquivo.

trans-unit.source: To display ToolTips for other controls in your application, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> control.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir dicas de ferramenta para outros controles em seu aplicativo, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control on a form and adds two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control em um formulário e adiciona dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `panel1`, displays status text for an application.
trans-unit.target: A primeira <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, denominado `panel1`, exibe o texto de status para um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class to display the current time.
trans-unit.target: A segunda <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, denominado `panel2`, exibe a data atual e usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> classe para exibir a hora atual.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> to add the panels to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.ShowPanels%2A> propriedade para garantir que os painéis são exibidos em vez de um painel padrão e utiliza o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> propriedade para acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> para adicionar os painéis para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> properties to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> propriedades para inicializar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objetos.

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo pressupõe que o método definido no exemplo é definido e chamado a partir do construtor de uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a string that contains information about the panel.
Returns a string that contains the class name for the control and the text it contains.
Gets or sets the width of the status bar panel within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control.
The width, in pixels, of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: A largura, em pixels, do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> property always reflects the actual width of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> and cannot be smaller than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> propriedade sempre reflete a largura real de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> e não pode ser menor do que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To automatically resize the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para redimensionar automaticamente a largura do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> para o conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.SizingGrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A> properties, and how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.SizingGrip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A> propriedades e como tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code into a form.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o exemplo, cole o código a seguir em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o `InitializeStatusBarPanels` método no construtor do formulário ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> método manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The width specified is less than the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth" /> property.
